wide range of weakly supervised QA tasks.from sentence: In this paper , we show it is possible to formulate a wide range of weakly supervised QA tasks as discrete latent - variable learning problems .

many recently introduced tasks.from sentence: We demonstrate that for many recently introduced tasks , which we group into three categories as given in , it is relatively easy to precompute a discrete , task - specific set of possible solutions that contains the correct solution along with a modest number of spurious options .

to determine.from sentence: The learning challenge is then to determine which solution in the set is the correct one , while estimating a complete QA model .

strongly enforce.from sentence: Intuitively , these hard updates more strongly enforce our prior beliefs that there is a single correct solution .

learning strategy.from sentence: We model the set of possible solutions as a discrete latent variable , and develop a learning strategy that uses hard - EM - style parameter updates .

updates.from sentence: This algorithm repeatedly ( i ) predicts the most likely solution according to the current model from the precomputed set , and ( ii ) updates the model parameters to further encourage its own prediction .
